response:
"warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unser persönliches daten ohne unsere zustimmung sammeln und nutzen? das ist eine verletzung unserer privatsphäre und ein bruch der datenschutzgesetze. wir müssen unsere daten schützen und fordern, dass unternehmen unsere privatsphäre respektieren. #datenschutz #privatsphäre #personalinformation"

translation:

"why are there still companies that collect and use our personal data without our consent? that's a violation of our privacy and a breach of data protection laws. we must protect our data and demand that companies respect our privacy. #dataprivacy #privacy #personalinformation"

this post critically examines the issue of companies collecting and using personal data without consent, which is a violation of privacy and data protection laws. it calls for individuals to take action to protect their data and demand that companies respect their privacy. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy), #privatsphäre (privacy), and #personalinformation (personal information) are used to reach a wider audience and make the post more discoverable by people interested in this topic.
